channel.title: LostSoul 667/723 FINAL RELEASE 5K Views 1k Downloads!
channel.description:
Well guys.... i quit rsps officially cuz players were dicks.... have the source have fun.... THIS WAS BASED ON TIZENX (THX TIZEN FOR YOUR AMAZING SOURCE)
Features: (TIZEN'S) -Perfect PK -Kill Streak System -Chest System -Portal System -Great New Anims -GREAT AREAS SUCH AS MONEYMAKING ADDED BY ME: -HighScores -Training Areas -Starters -Small commands like bow etc.. -Made commands cost money -Fixed ECO -Made tons of shops (thx SNOW) -DICING (Cache Sided) -CUSTOM CACHE (DONATOR SYMBOLS, FLAMMING SKULLS WORKING, CUSTOM TABS, CUSTOM LOGIN) -WORKING POLYPORE -NEW EMOTE TAB -ADDED THIEVING, Minning, ETC. -FLAMMING SKULLS ! EQUIPABLE -FULL DRAGON CEREMONIAL ARMOUR -STARTED DIALOGUE FOR SANTA (DONATOR SHOPS FOR NORMAL, LEGENDARY, EXTREME) -YOU HAVE TO FIX THE REST OF THE SHOPS -No Anti-leech :) -::rape to rape a hacker/spammers computer (opens 100 google.com's) -::scare to open a scary window on sum1's computer -INCLUDED A DROP EDITOR for NPCS:) NOT MINE BTW :P
PICS: [center][img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2zzqnb7.png[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2ntpv.png[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/ezkboj.png[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2mqkndt.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2h2r0qd.png[/img][/center]
[b][u][size=14pt]DOWNLOAD LINKS[/size][/u][/b]
CACHE: [url=http://uppit.com/9xpkyjowdrvj/cache.zip]http://uppit.com/9xpkyjowdrvj/cache.zip[/url]
SERVER: [url=http://uppit.com/5402ilgwr72u/lostsoul667.723.zip]http://uppit.com/5402ilgwr72u/lostsoul667.723.zip[/url] CREDITS : [b]DISTURBED'S AMAZING CLIENT[/b] CLIENT: [url=http://uppit.com/u7pb6voo4xx4/lostsoulclient.zip]http://uppit.com/u7pb6voo4xx4/lostsoulclient.zip[/url]

item.title: LostSoul 667/723 FINAL RELEASE 5K Views 1k Downloads!
item.dc:creator: @killer.john killer.john
item.description:
@killer.john wrote:

[quote=“zanderrfc, post:11, topic:449418”][quote author=CPUsquad link=topic=552315.msg4047413#msg4047413 date=1342196965]

I’m such a dumbass… Some kid leeched the server and I was like OMFG Nice coded server. And he’s like thanks I did alot of hard work on it… -.-

YOU TALKIN ABOUT ME? or sum other kid who hosted it?
[/quote]

Bro, on your other release I change everything where the ip’s are, the ports are the same i change every file that had it localhost & when i change it to my ip it just error_js5connect, im letting the port on my firewall & my router any suggestions?[/quote] just let the source load it up then when its fully loaded then run ur client nd it shouldnt give that error

item.title: LostSoul 667/723 FINAL RELEASE 5K Views 1k Downloads!
item.dc:creator: @vert642 vert642
item.description:
@vert642 wrote:

Me, when I tryed it not worked when I copyed it on the desktop but I copyed in a folder after that and it worked and for information I use Microsoft security essentials, I dont know why but every others programs like Avast and AVG not worked when i copyed this source in a folder, so I think the problem is to the virus protector. If not, then try to scan it on a virus scaner website. These is the link to the website I know: https://www.virustotal.com/. If it helped then can you Rep+ me please? I try to help the most I can

Read full topic

item.title: LostSoul 667/723 FINAL RELEASE 5K Views 1k Downloads!
item.dc:creator: @vert642 vert642
item.description:
@vert642 wrote:

Hello, I have a question to ask you…

  • Could you say me how to make me admin on this source please?

And I have something to explain too …

  • For the Client(to run it):
    • If you get the error that Java command is not a command then write (“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe”) without the ( ), you write it incase of Java into the run file.
      (Don’t know how to open it? Then just open with a .txt editor like Wordpad.)
    • If your not on Windows x64 just erase the (x86).

Thank you for your help and good luck
And please answer me…

Have a good day/night.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @CPUsquad CPUsquad
item.description:
@CPUsquad wrote:

[quote=“angelofdeath396, post:69, topic:449418”]Hey guys, I’m really sorry for grave digging, but I need someone’s help.

The polypore staff is not attacking normally. I’m not sure, but when I wield the polypore staff and attack, I hit the monster with the polypore staff instead of doing magical damage from a distance. Any ideas? Maybe
I’m using another polypore staff id and it’s not the correct one?

And how do I change the client picture from the LostSoul to runescape’s original current client picture or either my custom one.

Help would be kindly appreciated. Thank you.[/quote]

You can use STEVES SPRITE EDITOR to change out the bg if youd like and for the anims for polypore … it shud be right… if not try using a different version of polypore

Read full topic

item.title: LostSoul 667/723 FINAL RELEASE 5K Views 1k Downloads!
item.dc:creator: @angelofdeath396 angelofdeath396
item.description:
@angelofdeath396 wrote:

Hey guys, I’m really sorry for grave digging, but I need someone’s help.

The polypore staff is not attacking normally. I’m not sure, but when I wield the polypore staff and attack, I hit the monster with the polypore staff instead of doing magical damage from a distance. Any ideas? Maybe
I’m using another polypore staff id and it’s not the correct one?

And how do I change the client picture from the LostSoul to runescape’s original current client picture or either my custom one.

Help would be kindly appreciated. Thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: LostSoul 667/723 FINAL RELEASE 5K Views 1k Downloads!
item.dc:creator: @samuni34 samuni34
item.description:
@samuni34 wrote:

[quote=“CPUsquad, post:67, topic:449418”][quote author=samuni34 link=topic=552315.msg4063939#msg4063939 date=1343690070]
Nice Release I will use this to improve my coding (no leeching) Thanks for the awesome Source! :eek:

For the ones wondering how to change background it’s pretty easy… You need a sprite editor Use the search bar and you gonna find one.
Try to find Rs Sprites download them and find (in the sprite editor) the id “4139” from this one you get all the pictures for the login screen
-Sam
[/quote]

NP HAVE FUN :3[/quote]

Thanks Gl with future projects

-Sam

Read full topic
